info.name: Flow API v1
info.description:
# Introduction
What does your API do?

# Overview
Things that the developers should know about

# Authentication
What is the preferred way of using the API?

# Error Codes
What errors and status codes can a user expect?

# Rate limit
Is there a limit to the number of requests an user can send?

item.name: Autentication

request.description: Sending EMAIL contains url to change pwd

item.description: This folder contains a list of endpoints to perform the Sign Up, Sign In, Sign Out and Update and Reset Password

header.warning: This is a duplicate header and will be overridden by the Content-Type header generated by Postman.
